name: The Heretic
description:
Week 4 Game a Week Game made in 1 week prototype

Story -

Jedin is not any different to the run of the mill knight for the king and his family. However he does stand out for proving the most loyal subject to one of the most  corrupt rulers of his time. Each week a new person is sent to jail or executed for the belief that the king feels challenged in his position or the false word of heresy has been thrown about. However, Jedin's story is different as he has more willpower than most victims of a corrupt king down and decides to take matters into his own hands, by assassinating the king at his own trial, proving that he guilt came after the accusation of being a heretic and no different. It isn't safe whilst he is known for such an act, so he must escape the castle and into the forest where he can build his journey anew.

Controls -

A - Left

S - Back

D - Right

W - Forward

Space - Jump

Left Shift - Sprint

Mouse Move - Control Camera

E - Assasinate Target

Left Click - Swing Dagger
